mapper.select: SELECT wx.open_id AS openId, wx.work_num AS workNum, wx.`name`, per.dep_name AS depName, per.dep_id AS depId, per.phone, per.position, per.per_id AS perId, per.entry_date AS entryDate, bas.birthday, bas.id_card AS idCard, bas.house_address AS houseAddress, ( SELECT `name` FROM tb_tree tree WHERE locate(tree.pkid, per.tag_code) > 0 AND tree.`level` = 1 ) AS corporation, fi.regular_date as regularDate FROM tb_weixin_user wx LEFT JOIN tb_personnel per ON wx.work_num = per.work_num LEFT JOIN tb_personnel_basic bas ON bas.work_num = wx.work_num LEFT JOIN tb_personnel_file fi ON fi.work_num=wx.work_num WHERE wx.open_id =#{openId}
mapper.update: update tb_personnel set phone=#{phone} where per_id=#{perId}
update tb_personnel_basic set house_address=#{houseAddress} where per_id=#{perId}
mapper.select: SELECT wx.open_id AS openId, wx.work_num AS workNum, wx.`name`, per.dep_name AS depName, per.dep_id AS depId, per.phone, per.position, per.per_id AS perId, per.entry_date AS entryDate, bas.birthday, bas.id_card AS idCard, bas.house_address AS houseAddress, (select group_concat(tag.tag_name) from tb_tag_personnel tag where tag.work_num=wx.work_num) as tagName FROM tb_weixin_user wx LEFT JOIN tb_personnel per ON wx.work_num = per.work_num LEFT JOIN tb_personnel_basic bas ON bas.work_num = wx.work_num WHERE wx.name =#{name}
select count(*) from tb_blacklist where `name`=#{name} and type=1 and is_vaild=1
select count(*) from twf_dict where `type`=8 and code=#{code} and is_vaild=1
mapper.update: update tb_weixin_user set open_id=#{openId},binding_time=now() where work_num=#{workNum}
update tb_weixin_customer set open_id=#{openId},updated=now() where pkid=#{pkid}
mapper.select: select * from tb_weixin_customer where invite_code=#{inviteCode} limit 1
